name: Leave the Garden, Dudley!
description:
You are Dudley, a ladybug stuck in an underground garden. Fight your way through challenging hordes of enemies for a chance to leave the garden. My submission for the LTGDLTGJ 2022.

If you come across any glitches, please let me know. If the waves don't continue after you defeat all of the enemies, just restart the game, I didn't have time to work out that bug, and many others.

Also a special thank you to Codeman2468 for helping me compile the web build

(I am aware that levels can be beaten fast by spamming space, it is a remnant of my debug/testing tools)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Controls:

Jump - Z

Attack - X

Move - Arrow Keys

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Hit the orange bulbs to heal

Avoid anything that moves

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The SFX I used:

https://soundsbydane.itch.io/8-bit-sound-pack/download/eyJleHBpcmVzIjoxNjYxMDU2N...

Music: Eric Skiff - Song Name - A Night Of Dizzy Spells - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music

Music: Eric Skiff - Song Name - Jumpshot - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music
